word: H954 - בּוּשׁ - bûwsh - boosh - Shamed - வெட்கப்பட்ட

sections.paragraph: வெட்கமடை, நாணமடை, சலித்துப்போ, கலங்கு, வற்றிப்போ, இலச்சைப்படு - வினைச்சொல்
to put to shame, to be ashamed, to be disconcerted, to be disappointed
2) to be ashamed, to be disconcerted, to be disappointed (by reason of)
d) (Hithpolel) to be ashamed before one another

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to pale, that is, by implication to be ashamed; also (by implication) to be disappointed, or delayed: - (be, make, bring to, cause, put to, with, a-) shame (-d), be (put to) confounded (-fusion), become dry, delay, be long.
Cognate: H1317, H1322, H4016, H954, H955
